message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Its value to me is substantial, and I believe it has the potential to be extremely valuable for you as well.  I'm starting with a price of $2000000.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial price, but I'm also open to hearing your perspective and any counteroffers you might have.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While $1200000 is a significant amount, it's below what I need to make this deal work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1750000.  This reflects the unique value of the product and leaves room for both of us to benefit. I'm open to discussing this further if you're interested.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really need to keep the price below $1500000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1500000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
